name: DataSink
short_description: DataSink takes a JDBC ResultSet and streams it in in a format of your choice. You can as well zip the stream and send it over the network, if you want. DataSink currently implements the following table formats: DBF (the xBase file format), XHTML, and genericode. You can use it as an Ant task or directly from Java.
summary: Take a JDBC ResultSet and stream it in one of the supported formats
